io.werval.util

Class Numbers

extends Object
    Numbers utilities.

    • Method Detail

      • safeIntValueOf

        public static int safeIntValueOf(long aLong)
        Safely convert a long to an int. If the long is greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE then Integer.MAX_VALUE is returned.

        If the long is lesser than Integer.MIN_VALUE then Integer.MIN_VALUE is returned.

        Implementation use BigIntegers. See Math.toIntExact(long) for a throwing equivalent.

        Parameters:
        aLong - A long
        Returns:
        Converted int

      • safeLongValueOfSum

        public static long safeLongValueOfSum(long... longs)
        Safely compute the sum of the given longs. If the sum of all the longs is greater than Long.MAX_VALUE then Long.MAX_VALUE is returned.

        If the sum of all the longs is lesser than Long.MIN_VALUE then Long.MIN_VALUE is returned.

        Implementation use BigIntegers. See Math.addExact(long, long) for a throwing equivalent.

        Parameters:
        longs - longs to sum
        Returns:
        Computed sum

      • safeLongValueOfMultiply

        public static long safeLongValueOfMultiply(long... longs)
        Safely compute the product of the given longs. If the product of all the longs is greater than Long.MAX_VALUE then Long.MAX_VALUE is returned.

        If the product of all the longs is lesser than Long.MIN_VALUE then Long.MIN_VALUE is returned.

        Implementation use BigIntegers. See Math.multiplyExact(long, long) for a throwing equivalent.

        Parameters:
        longs - longs to multiply
        Returns:
        Computed product
